history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00537
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING MOBILE PHONE NETWORK SERVICE PROVIDERS TO OFFER INSURANCE FOR MOBILE PHONES
SHORT TITLE : The Mobile Phone Insurance Act
ABSTRACT : Protects cellphone owners against snatching, robbery and theft.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
